overview: Nikka Shaitan and gang members Raju Rummy,Chandu Dadi and Gullu Malai are known to play against law they plan to loot a van containing gold which is going to foreign land in scuffle Inspector Sagar gets wounded badly.Sr Inspector Sidhu manages to get hold of the van and arrest everyone involved in the robbery while Sagar recaptures in hospital government lays emergency period in which Nikka and his men are also put behind bars.
title: Apaatkaal
